title: Interpretation of a dream about excessive pomegranate in a dream and what does it mean, good or bad?

preview.html: Dreams and visions are of two types. There is a dream that carries real signs that portend the occurrence of an event in real life, and there are dreams that are signs that come from the subconscious mind and what the person went through during the day of the events and pressures to which he is exposed. The most important of which are these dreams that do not carry signs, rather they are dreams, and we present them through our article today, Interpretation of a Dream Pomegranates in a dream, through the Encyclopedia. Interpretation of a dream about pomegranates in a dream. Many people have wondered about the meaning of seeing a handful of pomegranates in a dream, and therefore the interpreters have explained this matter. A person dreams of many visions that contain different meanings and they should not be taken into complete consideration because scientists have indicated their existence. Unrealistic dreams are the result of a person’s stress and tension and do not have a realistic meaning in life. Dream interpretation and vision scholars say that dreaming of a large number of pomegranates indicates divine providence and that the vision heralds good things in the dreamer’s life. The abundance of pomegranates is one of the reassuring dreams that portends goodness in this world because it It indicates abundant livelihood in money, health, life, and blessing. Interpretation of a dream about pomegranates for a single woman. The interpretation of dreams varies from one person to another, and each dream contains signs that carry certain meanings, and scholars must interpret them. Seeing an unmarried woman carrying a pomegranate in a dream means that food enters her life and changes it for the better and can Be a good and moral husband. Seeing an unwet pomegranate in a girl’s dream means that she is surrounded by inappropriate people and therefore she must warn them and stay away from bad friends. If a single woman sees a pomegranate in her dream, this means that she will soon achieve her dreams and ambitions in life, God willing. Girls Women who see enlarged pomegranates in a dream show that they have good morals that make everyone love and appreciate them. Seeing eating pomegranates in a dream means that the girl is facing a health problem, but the dream portends recovery and the return of life to its normal course. Interpretation of a dream about pomegranates for a divorced woman. Interpreters indicate that the meaning of seeing pomegranates It varies depending on the dreamer’s condition. Seeing a divorced woman eating pomegranates in a dream means that she will hear happy news in the coming days. A divorced woman’s dream of pomegranates indicates that she is seeking success and will reach her goal in a short time. Seeing a rotten pomegranate means that the divorced woman was living a She is unhappy because of a failed marriage, but she has recently been able to make her life stable. Seeing excessive pomegranates in a divorced woman’s dream means that there are crises that she is going through, yet she can endure them and face difficulties. Giving a pomegranate in a dream to a married woman. A woman reported that she dreamed of giving a pomegranate to another person with her in a dream. The same dream and I wondered whether the vision portends good or bad. Interpreters indicate that if a married woman sees someone giving her an excessive amount of pomegranates, this is evidence of the abundance of her livelihood, as she may obtain an inheritance or money in the future. Seeing a married woman eating pomegranates means She lives a stable married life with her children. Scholars of interpretation of dreams and visions say that the dream of peeling the fruit of pomegranate

title: Seeing sweet potatoes in a dream

preview.html: But what is the interpretation of seeing sweet potatoes in a dream and what does this indicate, which we will present to you from the gptafser.com website in the following lines. Interpretation of seeing sweet potatoes in a dream for one girl. Seeing a girl in a dream peeling sweet potatoes and starting to eat them. Show that the date of her engagement is approaching and her husband will dream. With a happy and beautiful personality. Seeing her eating sweet potatoes and not needing a little sugar because of their sweetness is evidence of the beautiful life she lives and the love between her and her family. Eating potatoes with their skins indicates that the fortuneteller will face problems in her life, and God knows best. Seeing a single girl eating potatoes and she was sad. This indicates a crisis that the person having the vision is going through, and God knows best. If the viewer is a university student and sees that she is eating a potato, this indicates her excellence and success in her studies. It indicates achieving everything that the person having the vision seeks to achieve. Eating a sweet potato that tasted spoiled indicates The sadness that fills her life and the change of circumstances, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of seeing pepper in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing sweet potatoes in a dream for a married woman. Eating sweet potatoes in a dream for a married woman interprets comfort and happiness in her relationship with her husband. Carrying a sweet potato and starting to peel it is interpreted by a positive change in The life of the visionary and the achievement of various successes in her work. If the potato does not taste sweet, this indicates the injustice that the woman suffers in her life. If the visionary grows sweet potatoes in her garden, this indicates the rosy life she lives. Peeling sweet potatoes in a dream is interpreted The end of problems one after another, it is one of the visions worthy of praise. Seeing a married woman with her family eating potatoes in a dream indicates the atmosphere of happiness and psychological comfort in which she lives. Eating sweet potatoes in a dream indicates psychological comfort and peace of mind from any problems affecting the viewer. If a married woman sees that her husband is planting sweet potatoes, this means that she will get a lot of money and a lot. Perhaps it was wealth that her husband acquired and she will do everything in his power to change his life, his wife and his children. Growing sweet potatoes at home, shows that the owners of the house will be exposed to problems and disputes in The near future. Interpretation of seeing sweet potatoes in a dream about a man and its meaning. A man who sees sweet potatoes in his dream means that he will get a lot of money earned in a project or trade he undertakes. Seeing a man planting sweet potatoes is a sign of instability and problems that turn his life and his family upside down. Either seeing sweet potatoes in a man’s dream interprets happiness and stability in life. Seeing sweet potatoes planted by a stolen man is interpreted as a solution to that person’s problems in an unexpected way. Sweet potatoes, in a dream, indicate doing business and profitable projects, and he will succeed. Indeed, washing potatoes in a man’s dream indicates renewing the situation, changing it for the better, and achieving success. If a man applies for a job and sees a

title: Interpretation of dreams to see grilled fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing grilled fish in a dream Interpretation of a dream about a fish by Imam al-Sadiq in dreams through the interpretation books of Imam al-Sadiq, Ibn Sirin, al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, or Ibn Kathir for a single, married, pregnant, or divorced woman, as the fish indicates the presence. For a large number of sources of livelihood and marriage to a young man and a girl, the birth of a male is good luck and you hate a small fish or see thorns and indicate life's problems and concerns, and this will be explained in detail by the interpretation of a dream about fish in a dream. Grilled fish in a dream for Imam al-Sadiq The general interpretation of Imam al-Samak generally indicates that the person intended will obtain a lot of sustenance and goodness. Whoever sees grilled fish in his dream, this is a sign that this person who has the vision has been wishing for something for a long time and is still waiting for it to come true. And seeing this vision, it means that God will fulfill this desire soon. He also interpreted the dream of grilled fish for an unmarried girl. And soon she will get a good and calm husband from God, be pleased with him and experience happiness and satisfaction. Interpretation of a dream about grilled fish in a single dream And since she was eating fish and it had a delicious taste, this indicates her marriage to a rich and generous young man. Eating dead fish is undesirable and indicates failure in one's life. Interpretation of a dream about grilled fish in a dream for a married woman Seeing her eating fish and it has many thorns shows that there are people in her life who are planning to hate, hate and be jealous of her And her envy. Large fried fish indicates an increase in money from a distinguished institution or business, and small fried fish indicates many worries and misfortunes. Fishing from polluted or unclean waters can indicate many sins or misdeeds or bad behavior or hearing sad news. Interpretation of a dream about grilled fish in a divorced woman's dream Seeing her buying fish, cleaning it and cutting it means an abundance of life and achieving her dreams in life and the disappearance of her fears and anxiety and enjoying good health and psychological comfort. Eating delicious and delicious fish indicates success in professional life, abundance of money, good wages, and overcoming the difficult stages of her life. Interpretation of a dream about grilled fish in a pregnant woman's dream Seeing that you are eating delicious and delicious fish indicates the presence of beautiful offspring for boys and girls. And an increase in goodness and blessings in her life, and buying grilled fish indicates an easy birth. Eating fried fish indicates the family's endeavors and stability because it indicates the birth of a newborn child. Interpretation of a dream about grilled fish in a man's dream Seeing fish in celibacy indicates many benefits and goodness, and may indicate the marriage of a beautiful girl. A small fish indicates competitions And hostilities and it is not recommended to see it in a dream. Fried fish indicates success in business, reaching the meaning, and grilled fish indicates good news and livelihood. Burnt fish indicates worries and sorrows. A man’s fishing indicates his marriage. Catching dead fish indicates that she is sad or hears bad news. Interpretation of eating grilled fish in the dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about listening to church hymns in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams Listening to church hymns in a dream If you are looking for an interpretation of a dream of listening to church hymns in a dream, we present in the following lines what interpretation scholars have mentioned. Interpretation of a dream of listening to church hymns in a dream The interpretation of a dream of listening to church hymns in a dream may reflect an average Rates at work, and God knows best. If the dreamer hears church hymns in a dream, this may indicate concealment in the house, and God knows the unseen. When seeing a single girl, hearing church hymns may indicate the presence of a jacket in the house, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about sweeping a church in a dream. Interpretation of dreams About sweeping the church in a dream. Cleaning the church can lead to good things, and God knows what is not seen. If the dreamer sees himself cleaning the church in a dream, this may be evidence of his closeness to Almighty God, as he can get closer to God and do what the Lord has commanded him to do, and God knows the unseen. If a pregnant woman sees herself As she cleans the church in a dream, this could be evidence that she is close to God and is doing what God has commanded her to do, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about eating in church in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about eating in church in a dream can indicate non-compliance with obligations, and God knows. The UnseenIn the event that the dreamer sees himself eating in a church, this may indicate the difficulties he is going through, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is eating in a church, it can express wrong decisions, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about demolishing a church in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about demolishing may differ. A church in a dream according to the dreamer’s religion, since if a Muslim sees a church being demolished, this may lead to committing sins, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Whereas the demolition of a church may express the evil that befalls the dreamer, and God knows the unseen. If a Christian sees that the church has been demolished, this may lead to Goodness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about washing in a church in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about washing in a church in a dream. We did not find clear explanations for seeing ablution in a church. However, seeing a church can lead to asceticism in this world, and God knows best. When you see a church, you may show sadness, and God knows the unseen. That the vision of the church also expresses the unjust ruler, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. Interpretation of a dream about a Jew praying in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about a Jew praying in a dream. Dealing with Jews could be an indication of hypocrisy, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees herself in a dream dealing with Jews, this may be Evidence of hatred, and God is supreme, and everyone knows. When a single girl sees dealing with Jews, it can lead to hypocrisy, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees that he is making friends with Jews in a dream, this may be a sign that he has caused harm to others, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about talking to Jew in a dreamInterpretation of a dream that we are talking with a Jew in a dream could be a sign of committing sins and transgression

title: Interpretation of a dream about dry fodder in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about dry fodder in a dream: If you want to know the interpretation of a dream about dry fodder in a dream, it is one of the dreams that many people want to know the interpretation of this vision. Let us discover its interpretation with some diligence, and the translators and the reader should realize that it is from the jurisprudence of scholars. The site does not earn its income from interpretations, but rather One of the diligent scholars who seek to interpret dreams. Interpretation of a dream about dry fodder in a dream Taking dry fodder in a dream may indicate some obstacles that the dreamer may face in his life during this time, and God knows best. If there is a vision of buying chicken feed in a dream, it may indicate This indicates good changes that will occur to the dreamer in his life during this time, thanks to God. Seeing eating animal fodder in a dream may indicate diseases that may affect the vision, and God knows best. Seeing storing dry fodder in a dream may indicate distance from the material obstacles that the dreamer may face during This time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the dead giving fodder to the living in a dream: Seeing a dead person giving food to the living in a dream may indicate good things that may come to the dreamer during those days, thanks to God. Seeing taking fodder from the dead in a dream could indicate positive changes Which may happen to the dreamer in his life during this time, and God knows best. It is possible that the vision of taking fodder from the dead in a dream indicates the good changes that will occur to the vision or the ability to satisfy desires and dreams, and God knows best. It is possible that the vision of receiving fodder from the dead In a dream, it indicates many good things that the person with the vision can achieve in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about sifting flour in a dream: Seeing a flour sieve in a dream may indicate the abundance of money that the person with the vision may gain in his life during this time, thanks to God. In the event that one sees sifted flour in a dream, this may indicate wrong words received by the dreamer and his family and he must ask God for help. Seeing sifted flour in a dream may indicate losing money in a not good market during this time, and God knows best. Seeing a fine sieve in a dream could indicate bad events that may happen to the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about harvesting barley in a dream Collecting barley in a dream may indicate material gains that the dreamer may obtain in his life during this time, and God knows best. If one sees that he is collecting barley in a dream, this may indicate the material gains and extensive life that the dreamer may achieve during this period, thanks to God. If one sees harvesting barley in a dream, it may indicate his closeness to God Almighty, and avoiding disobedience and sins during this time. period, thanks to God. If a person sees harvesting barley in a dream, this may indicate the material gains and gains that the dreamer may obtain in his life during this period, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of sheep, rams, goats, and lambs in a dream

preview.html: A sheep in a dream, interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about sheep. Sheep, rams, sheep, and goats are among the animals whose sight is intended for goodness and blessing. There were many interpretations of this vision by Sheikh Ibn Shirin, Al-Nabulsi and others, as follows. Seeing sheep in a dream. Sheep in general in a dream symbolize obedience and flexibility that the fortuneteller follows in dealing with his family and loved ones. Seeing a small sheep in a dream indicates that the young man enjoys the dreamer and in turn indicates friendship. And love. As for slaughtering sheep in a dream, it portends the death of one of the dreamer’s relatives. When an unmarried woman sees a sheep in her dream, this indicates her close relationship with a person of weak character. As for the black sheep, it symbolizes the fleeting love that she will experience for a while. For a married woman, the white sheep is a sign that she will soon become pregnant. If her father or brother gives her a sheep in her dream, this portends her strength and material gains. As for the pregnant woman, the dream of a sheep shows her the number of months of her pregnancy. Whoever dreams that he is slaughtering a ram or a sheep while in reality he is in a war or battle, then he will be victorious. Whoever sees himself in a dream slaughtering a sheep and does not If there is a war or a battle, then the indications of this dream are that the dreamer has repented to God and accepted his repentance. And if a person sees the same dream of slaughter, and in reality he is in debt or has obligations that worry and worry him, then the dream indicates that God will relieve him of his duties and worries. The same dream in the shadow sees that in reality he is imprisoned or subject to punishment or punishment, this means that the dreamer will find comfort. Whoever dreams that he sold a sheep or a ram to an honorable and honest man indicates his recovery from an illness or disease. If he is sick or has been exposed to a fatal blow, then God will save him. Whoever sees in a dream that there is a sheep or a ram that follows him wherever he goes and follows him with the intention of harming him, this indicates that in reality there is an enemy lurking for him and following him. Whoever dreams in his dream that a sheep or a ram has collided with him and scattered him, then his enemy will be struck by it or the dreamer will be injured. Whoever dreams that he is riding a ram or a sheep, then the dreamer will gain great fertility. Whoever dreams that a man, whether unknown or known, delivers a sheep as a sacrifice, this indicates that The dreamer will honor God’s son and he will be one of the sober ones. Whoever dreams that he is arguing and arguing with a sheep or a ram, then the dreamer will argue with a person with a huge body and a corpse, and if he hits him in the dream, he will defeat him in reality. Whoever sees that a sheep is slaughtered in the middle of his house and peeled, one of the people of the household will die. Whoever dreams By eating raw lamb or ram before cooking, this means that the dreamer will stab a Muslim. Interpretation of sheep in a dream - YouTube

title: What do shoes mean in a single woman's dream?

preview.html: What do shoes mean in a single woman’s dream? Interpretations of dreams vary from one person to another, so it is best to seek the help of interpreters to correctly understand the meanings of dreams. Seeing shoes in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that she is a social person who is loved by everyone around her, so it is a reassuring dream. Dreaming about shoes means that an unmarried girl sets her goals for success in her professional life, and the dream foretells that she will achieve what she seeks, God willing. Seeing shoes in an unmarried woman’s dream means that she is trying to be independent in her life and will be able to create her own business and succeed in it. The world. Dreaming about shoes in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that she is very close to her family and everyone is proud of her and all her successes. Wearing navy shoes in a dream for a single woman. Interpreters and scholars believe that seeing blue shoes in an unmarried woman’s dream is a sign of major crises in the girl’s life, but Things will turn in her favor in the coming days. Seeing dark blue shoes in an unmarried girl’s dream means that she is going through an emotional problem that is causing her sadness and distress, and she must end this relationship and enjoy her life. Seeing navy shoes changing to blue and green indicates that life will improve and that the unhappiness she feels will go away. God willing. A dream about blue shoes is interpreted as seeing an unmarried girl, and that she is failing in her studies, and this makes her feel sad and sad. Interpretation of a dream about high heels: Seeing high shoes in an unmarried girl’s dream is interpreted as having a prominent position in the world, where she often works In a high-ranking job, and this can be seen from the dream. Seeing high shoes in a dream for an unmarried woman and she is happy means that she will succeed in her life, whether in professional or social life. Seeing that high-heeled shoes are presented to a girl means that she will marry a good and pious man in the period Coming and life will develop happily. Seeing an unmarried girl wearing high shoes indicates that she can get a job in the army and become a great asset to society. Interpretation of a dream about black shoes for single women: An unmarried girl’s dream about black shoes is interpreted as a generous personality who loves to help everyone around her, and as a result Therefore, you will get a lot of goodness, God willing. Seeing black shoes in a girl’s dream means that she has good qualities and is a girl of religious character, and you will hear happy news in the coming days. Seeing black shoes in an unmarried girl’s dream means that she will come close to achieving her dreams and ambitions and will reach a level High at work. Some interpreters believe that wearing black shoes in a dream is a praiseworthy vision that portends goodness and comfort for the dreamer’s life. Seeing black shoes with a girl feeling sad in a dream indicates that this is evidence that she will hear sad news during the coming period. She can bear Seeing black shoes in the dream of an unmarried woman who was in a state of joy means that she will marry a good-hearted man and have children with him.

title: The 8 most famous interpretations of seeing dead people in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a vision of eating sweets with the dead? Evidence of stability and a bright future. What does it mean to see a married woman eating rice with a dead person? It indicates stability and cover. What is the interpretation of seeing him eating with a dead person who is one of his relatives? It indicates goodness and happiness. Interpretation of a vision of eating with a dead person? A strange man in a dream? Details of expatriation and travel. What is the interpretation of seeing him eating with a dead person while he is corrupt? It indicates the death of blessings and lack of food. Interpretation of a dream about feeding the dead by Ibn Sirin. To dream of eating with a deceased person and the deceased was fair in his work, this indicates good and just company. And a vision That he eats with the dead person while it is corrupt, this indicates the death of blessings and lack of food. Then seeing the feeding of the deceased and he was one of his relatives, this indicates goodness and livelihood that will come to the dreamer. Seeing him eating with the dead grandmother, this is an indication of the loss of blessings in the dreamer’s life. Then, seeing Food with dead coffee in a dream, this is an indication of abundant nutrition. Seeing someone in a dream eating food from the dead and not eating it, this is a sign of poverty. Interpretation of a dream about feeding a dead man to a man. Eating with the deceased in the dream and it was a woman is evidence of longevity. Then seeing food with A strange man in a dream is a sign of alienation and travel. Seeing him eating with a deceased person who was one of his relatives indicates goodness and happiness. Therefore, seeing someone eating with a dead grandfather in a man’s dream is an indication of a good life. Seeing someone eating with an unknown dead person is a sign of alienation. And travel. Seeing a dream of feeding the dead for an unmarried woman. A girl who eats food with her dead brother in a dream is a sign of relief. Then seeing a girl feeding the dead in a dream, this is evidence of relief from distress. Seeing a girl eating rice with a dead person indicates good morals and happiness. Interpretation A dream about feeding the dead for a married woman: If a married woman sees herself eating rice with the dead, this indicates stability and concealment. Then if she sees that she is eating with the deceased grandmother, this indicates a state of asceticism and the wealth that she will acquire. Interpretation of a dream about feeding the dead for a pregnant woman: If the pregnant woman sees that she is eating rice flour With a dead person, this is a sign of approaching birth. Hence, seeing dead food in a pregnant woman’s dream is an indication of easy delivery. Seeing a dream of feeding the dead in Nabulsi. If one sees in a dream that he is eating bread with the dead, this indicates that he will get a lot of money. To feed the dead in a dream with cooked meat, this indicates justice and religion. If one dreams of a dead person eating uncooked meat, this is a sign of death and illness. Then seeing the dead person eating with the dead person, whether male or female, is a sign of getting rid of worries. Seeing the dead They eat honey, and this is evidence of a broad diet. Then seeing sweets with the deceased is a sign of stability and a bright future.

Then seeing sweets with the deceased is a sign of stability and a bright future.

title: Interpretation of seeing water in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing water in a dream, and what are the different indicators and interpretations that this vision expresses? Water is the basis of life, and without the presence of water, human life and all living things end. Therefore, this vision is one of the important visions that conveys many messages to the viewer, which differ depending on the type of water, whether it is hot, cold, fresh, or salt water, and we will tell you more about the interpretation through this. The article. Seeing water in dreams, Sheikh Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi, said that seeing water in a dream is a sign of knowledge, a happy life, and an increase in offspring and money, according to the condition of the water that the dreamer sees. Seeing fresh water in a dream for an unmarried young man is a sign of marriage soon, according to the Almighty’s saying: (And it Who created man from water and made him descendants and in-laws.) God Almighty has spoken the truth. Imam Ibn Shaheen believes that water in a dream is an expression of satisfying a person’s needs and an expression of recovery from illness for those who are afflicted with diseases. However, if a person sees that he is buying fresh water from a well, then this is the case. Repenting for it is a sin. Testing cold water in a dream by the dreamer is lawful money that will happen to him soon, but in the case of giving people water to drink, this is evidence that the dreamer is doing good deeds without taking anything in return for them. Seeing water in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that Drinking water in a dream for someone who feels very thirsty is a lot of money that he will get after poverty, while drinking a lot in a dream is a sign of longevity and survival from the enemy. But seeing drinking hot water is a bad vision and expresses committing sins and transgressions, selling Water in a dream is injustice to people and an unjust deprivation of their rights. Ibn Sirin believes that the dream of drinking water from a glass cup without feeling suffocated is one of the serious problems that the dreamer faces in relation to his wife, but if the cup breaks and water remains, then this is a bad vision and indicates the death of the mother and the survival of the boy. The vision of giving water and drinking from it in halal vessels represents the wife according to the Sharia method, but drinking from gold vessels represents the corruption of the marriage according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Sheikh Al-Nabulsi. Seeing water in a dream for a single woman. To dream of running water for an unmarried woman and it was clear and clean is an important vision that foretells The situation will improve for her and she will be saved from trouble, but if she drinks from it, it is good news for her that she will get married soon. As in the interpretation of Imam Ibn Sirin. If a virgin girl sees that she is walking on water with a slope without falling into it, then this vision is a symbol and good news for achieving success and excellence in the fields of study and work. Jurists said that a dream about someone spraying one girl with water is a vision that symbolizes her good conditions. She is blessed in life and all things are made easy for her, but if it is known to her then she is happy. Newsletter. For marriage. While the dream of a girl washing with fresh water indicates the purity of the soul and heart and the desire to repent and get closer to God Almighty, but if the water is hot, it is a shameful vision and indicates many sorrows. Seeing water in a dream for a married womanFor a woman

title: Seeing cockroaches in a dream - Seeing a cockroach being killed in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a cockroach for an unmarried, married, pregnant or divorced girl is either killed with pesticides or crushed by eating the red black cockroach and the big bird by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and others. Seeing insects, insects and cockroaches is envious eyes, lepers are envious, and cockroaches are small eyes that are jealous of your decorations and clothes, even if you kill one, this means God Almighty has saved you from one of them, and we ask God Almighty to save us from the rest. Dreaming of crawling insects such as cockroaches means illness and many problems. If you can get rid of it, it means that you will achieve a little success in your business, and if you cannot get rid of it, it means death for you or your relatives. If you dream that a crawling insect is attacking you, then you can expect serious problems in the coming days. If you kill it, you will be able to overcome obstacles. A dream about cockroaches can be an enemy, because the cockroach is hated everywhere, and it can be bad words from a bad person, because people abhor it, and it is hateful and malicious, and it can indicate a foul invasion. It can be bad news, and it can be annoying with sound, because some cockroaches have a voice, and it can be an attack on the fortuneteller by a person with bad features, because some of them fly and the name of the cockroach can be corrupted and get many meanings from it, such as insisting on something, clicking, Pictures, crackles, etc., the end of the specifications of the cockroach are taken as specifications. A person is a symbol of a tan, a short circuit and a permanent. A large number of cockroaches is what indicates trouble, and if you are present in the house, you are part of the family. Either one cockroach, two cockroaches, or three cockroaches, this indicates a gentle, immoral person, that is, he sneaks in with kind words. To deceive those around him, and it may be from the neighbors as well, because it is from the area of ​​the house and not in one of the rooms of the house, so be careful, but those around you. Cockroaches may indicate envy for you or enemies. They indicate an eye or magic for you. If you kill cockroaches in a dream and they die, this means that the eye I'm gone! If you see a sink with cockroaches coming out of it, this means that one of your drains is magical. Seeing cockroaches in a dream for someone may be disturbing, because they express envy, as seeing insects in a dream in abundance and in reality also indicates the presence of envy in that person’s house, as cockroaches indicate To diseases that may affect humans. Home and also indicates that you have magic. Seeing cockroaches in a dreamSeeing cockroaches in a dream indicates many misfortunes that will befall a person, especially problems related to magic, envy, and diseases. Seeing a single cockroach means that there is a hypocritical friend who is trying to deceive you. Killing a cockroach in a dream is a victory over an opponent. Having A cockroach means that you have become more interested in your life than before. Seeing a group of cockroaches means that you will be exposed to shameful things against you. Seeing a dead cockroach means that someone is trying to block your path. Seeing a cockroach flying means that you emerged victorious from a situation that was worrying you because of someone. Cockroaches are a sign There are major problems on the material and moral levels. Killing a group of cockroaches is a good omen and evidence of paying off debts.
